text.name: sys_description
text.text: The CP System III (Capcom Play System 3), more commonly known as CPS3 or CPS-3, is an arcade system which was introduced by Capcom in 1996 with the game Red Earth, in order to succeed the arcade system CP System II. The CPS3 has not been very successful, only six games in total have been developed including the very successful Street Fighter III trilogy, only by Capcom and it is the latest arcade system to date designed and manufactured by Capcom.
